duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive strategies for service customer account Leadership, including Labor and Material growth and execution of the Service business, for the team’s customer base.
Lead and manage the execution of assigned Service business to ensure profitability & productivity of the team. Manages customer relationship development and satisfaction.
Responsible for procuring and maintaining fleet and tools inventory, ensuring consistency of delivery systems through supervision and audits of Technicians and Customer Service Agent.
Reviews and approves all Labor and Material quotations, as well as responsible for budgeting, forecasting, accounts payables/receivables.

Responsible for maintaining appropriate staffing levels, hiring, training, and transitioning new employees. Conducts formal performance reviews, and all related issues. Also accountable for safety performance and program compliance.

education_certification.credential: Technical school training or equivalent experience in HVAC or building controls industry. Diploma in Electronic or Mechanical Systems preferred.
